Game info:

Codemasters StudiosÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ designers are back creating a totally reinvigorated McRae experience. The new Colin McRae title will go beyond the seriesÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ point-to-point rallying to deliver the most diverse selection of extreme off-road competitions. Sensational gravel, mud and dirt racing events from the world over will include perilous Hill Climb and collision-packed Rally Cross events.

International rallying competitions will also feature, with official cars on tracks based on real roads and locations around the globe. The title will also expand on beat-the-clock racing and include events with multiple cars on track to satisfy anyone who wants to push their on-the-edge driving just that bit further.
